Audio Understand

Source: vignettes/audio_understanding.qmd

Quick start

You can use sample audio file from pixabay

Note, gemini_audio will use “Describe this audio” as default prompt.

library(gemini.R)
gemini_audio(audio = "helloworld.mp3")

# text
# "The audio contains a clear, crisp recording of a person saying \"Hello\".
# Following the phrase is a distinct, repeated percussive sound, possibly a rhythmic
# tapping or clicking noise. The sound is consistent and mechanical in nature.\n"

Developed by Jinhwan Kim.
